oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fraterville Mine Explosion and Cross Mountain Mine Explosion memorial services, 1924.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Program for memorial services in memory of those who lost their lives in the Fraterville Mine Explosion at Coal Creek, Tennessee on Monday May 19th, 1902 and in the Cross Mountain Mine Explosion at Briceville, Tennessee on Saturday, December 9th, 1911. Program for services at Methodist Church, Coal Creek, TN. May 19, 1924. 4 pp. Lists names of the dead and place of burial and letters written in Fraterville Mine.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mine accidents; Memorial rites & ceremonies; Ephemera;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
